keyMoments.title: Masira's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Masira arrives to claim salvage rights over the St. Briss, introducing himself as the 'Salvage King' and captain of the Masira Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a character who will later become an important ally in the quest to reach Skypiea.
keyMoments.quote: I'm Masira, Captain of the Masira Pirates! I'm the King of All Salvagers!

keyMoments.title: Masira Boards the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Masira briefly boards the Going Merry before being kicked off by the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the rough but ultimately friendly relationship between Masira and the crew.

abilities.description: Expert at underwater diving and recovering shipwrecks from the sea floor.
Possesses immense physical strength, capable of knocking out giant sea creatures underwater.

relationships.description: Masira's older brother, also a member of the Saruyama Alliance.

reveals.information: Captain of the Masira Pirates and professional salvager

keyMoments.title: The Master's Debut
keyMoments.description: A character known as 'The Master' makes their first appearance during the Jaya arc events.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a new character in the series.

keyMoments.title: Robin Identifies the St. Briss
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her archaeological knowledge to identify the fallen ship as the St. Briss, an exploration ship from South Blue that has been missing for over 200 years.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's invaluable knowledge and analytical skills.
keyMoments.quote: That ship must be the St. Briss, an exploration ship from the South Blue. That man has been dead for at least 200 years.

keyMoments.title: Robin Deduces the Danger
keyMoments.description: Robin quickly realizes that Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji were swallowed by the giant sea turtle when she sees the air hoses in its mouth.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's quick thinking and observational skills in crisis situations.
keyMoments.quote: The air hoses are in the monster's mouth! Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro were eaten by that thing!

keyMoments.title: Robin Secures Eternal Pose to Jaya
keyMoments.description: Robin obtains an Eternal Pose pointing to Jaya from the Masira Pirates, providing the crew with navigation to their next destination.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's actions directly enable the crew to continue their journey toward Skypiea.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Boards Buggy's Ship
keyMoments.description: Ace appears on Buggy's ship, seemingly intoxicated or asleep, causing panic among Buggy's crew.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the comedic subplot while reinforcing Whitebeard's fearsome reputation through Buggy's terror.

keyMoments.title: Ace Parties on Buggy's Ship
keyMoments.description: Ace wakes up and immediately starts partying with Buggy's crew, displaying his carefree and friendly nature.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Ace's personality and creates humorous contrast with Buggy's fear.

keyMoments.title: Buggy Explains Whitebeard's Power
keyMoments.description: Buggy tells his crew that Whitebeard is the only pirate who fought equally with Gol D. Roger and is the strongest man in the world, explaining why they cannot harm Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes crucial world-building about the power hierarchy among pirates and builds anticipation for Whitebeard's appearance.
keyMoments.quote: Whitebeard is the only one who tied in a fight against Gol D. Roger! He's the strongest man in the world!

reveals.information: Knows about Whitebeard's legendary status and his history with Gol D. Roger
